AlmenaraGames.​MLPASAnimatorSFXController
MonoBehaviour
public
AlmenaraGames.​MLPASAnimatorSFXController

This component works like an extension and allows the assignment of some Scene references that the MLPASAnimatorSFX is not capable to do.
